Subsection.title: Name
Subsection.Paragraph: package schema - Show the package schema.

Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: The package schema command prints the currently-supported package schema.

FormalItem.title: Example
FormalItem.Verbatim:
$ montarre package schema <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="urn:com.io7m.montarre.package:1" xmlns:mp="urn:com.io7m.montarre.package:1">
<xsd:simpleType name="ApplicationKindType"> <xsd:annotation> ...
